question: Which state Government has recently launched the mobile application, Rythu Mitra?
explanation:
Telangana Finance Minister T Harish Rao and Agriculture Minister Singireddy Niranjan Reddy launched Rythu Mitra, an exclusive mobile application on 17 November 2019. The app aimed to serve the needs of farmers of Siddipet. The Ministers also reviewed the progress of the 30-day action plan in the district. They distributed tractors to 117 Gram Panchayats under the Palle Pragathi programme.
Using Rythu Mitra, the farmers can get advices and guidance from experts and agriculture extension officers (AEOs). They can also access information regarding government schemes, subsidies, and other kinds of government assistance being extended to the farm sector. The farmers can check updates on Rythu Bandhu release, the progress of Rythu Bima claims, and other issues.
